Phone:
| Email:
|
Address: 65/30 Giải Phóng Street, Ward 4, Tân Bình District, Hồ Chí Minh City
Desire to find a suitable job and work in a professional environment, challenge project with my experience in software development and Fintech department.

- Good technical knowledge about manual framework.
- Have experiences in many kinds of testing. (Website testing, Mobile application testing (Android/iOS)
- Have average good English skill.
- Have experience in management project via Jira
- Good at communicate, team work or individual environment.
- Enthusiastic, self-motivated, responsible at work.
- Eagerness to learn.
- Ability to work well under high pressure.
- Ability to understand and adapt quickly to new organizational cultures.
- Ability to carry a meeting and make deals.
- Analyze business and requirement/PRD to determine PO's requirement
- Work with Stakeholders to know and understand Customer special requirements.
- Planning test for features and regression.
- Familiar with working in Scrum model.
- Basic knowledge of auto-testing: Selenium, Java

- ⯍ Testing: Website testing (UX/UI, Functional) | Mobile application testing (Android/iOS)
- ⯍ English: Writing | Reading |Speaking | Communication | Document analysis
- ⯍ Soft skills: Teamwork | Communication | Problem solving | Adaptability | Time management | Scrum/Agile

IT TESTING SPEACIALIST HOME CREDIT
- ⯍ QC in Mobile project of Home Credit app - one of the best Finance app in
- o Perform test on mobile native apps (Android)
- o Analyze PRD and work with PO, BA to define and design test cases for new features: user management, loan contracts, payment with momo…
- o Create test plan
- o Test report on new features for stakeholders
- o Report and track defects
- o Perform regression test for each release

2/2019 to 6/2021
Ho Chi Minh City
- o Working with eWallet application in the most popular financial apps on mobile
- o Being a key member of Front End team
- o Main QC of Bank Intergration project
- o Perform testing features on mobile native apps (Android/iOS): Topup, withdraw, money transfer, payment,…
- o Perform testing Payment, Bank intergration on web platform.
- o Work with Bank's PIC to gather information and requirements
- o Analyze PRD and work with stakeholders to define and design test cases for integration new banks in ZaloPay app
- o Analyze PRD and work with stakeholders to define and design test cases for new feature: topup at merchant POS
- o Work with Bank's PIC to perform testing for Bank test records document when intergrate new bank.
- o Work with Merchant PIC to testing admin tool and merchant tool for features Topup at merchant POS: transaction history, transaction fundback history, transaction management
- o Manage and estimate effort for assigned tasks
- o Log works
- o Manage timeline

7/2021 to now
Ho Chi Minh City
- o Work building app GameDays for US region: a winning money quiz app.
- o Work building app Big Rich for US region: an e-commerce app.
- o Work with BA to analyze and finalize requirement release for each sprint
- o Manage tasks of each member in scrum team.
- o Give idea about new feature if needed.
- o Manage project release plan to meet customer expected.
- o Report project's development progress weekly for customer.
- o Perform testing on mobile app Android/iOS.
- o Perform testing on web admin site.
- o Perform API testing.
- o Perform regression test for each release.
- o Create test scenarios for each feature.
- o Created and documented requirements after working with customer.
EDUCATION
SOFTWARE MANAGEMEN Văn Lang University Hồ Chí Minh City
MILITARY OBLIGATION
Biên Hòa, Đồng Nai Province
